description: This cocktail is named for the gun barrel because it's meant to be sipped and enjoyed like you would a&nbsp;fine cigar. It is perfect for any fan of&nbsp;vodka who wants to take their drinking experience up a notch. So put on your cowboy boots and prepare to stir something special!
name: Gun Barrel
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant (or any currant-infused vodka)

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir or dry-shake the mixture to combine.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir or dry-shake the mixture to combine.
